ThingDef.label: Crystal lung
ThingDef.description: An artifical lung. A pair of these form the core of the human respiratory system.

ThingDef.label: Crystal kidney
ThingDef.description: An artifical kidney. Filters and removes waste products from the blood.

ThingDef.label: Crystal liver
ThingDef.description: An artifical liver. Plays an important role in metabolism.

ThingDef.label: Crystal stomach
ThingDef.description: An artificial stomach. A set of minerals efficiently digest nearly any foodstuff. An integrated lattice-dust healing system automatically repairs any damage caused by the powerful acids. It is better than a biological stomach in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: Crystal jaw
ThingDef.description: An artifical jaw. Plays an important role in eating.

ThingDef.label: Crystal eye
ThingDef.description: An artifical eye. It is better than a biological eye in almost every way. The crystal structure allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: Crystal arm
ThingDef.description: An artificial arm. The crystal structure allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: Crystal leg
ThingDef.description: An artificial leg. The crystal structure allows it to recover from damage.

ThingDef.label: Crystal spine
ThingDef.description: An artificial spine. It matches the performance of a biological spine.

ThingDef.label: Crystal heart
ThingDef.description: An artificial heart. It is better than a biological heart in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: Crystal ear
ThingDef.description: An artificial ear.

ThingDef.label: Crystal nose
ThingDef.description: An artificial nose.

ThingDef.label: Crystal hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial hand. It does not have fingers, but can be combined with steel at the smithy to create powerful tools.

ThingDef.label: Crystal claw hand
ThingDef.description: A combat-oriented hand replacement consisting of a mineral hand with a vicious claw on each finger. It is vicious in combat, and its powerful claws can crush a skull like a natural hand crushes an egg. The blades can be retracted, making it as useful as a biological hand for non-combat tasks.

ThingDef.label: Crystal drill hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial drill hand. It speeds up mining and improves the mining yield.

ThingDef.label: Crystal crafting hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial crafting hand. It contains crafting tools and speeds up general labor.

ThingDef.label: Crystal sickle hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial sickle hand. It speeds up plant work speed and improves the harvest yield.

ThingDef.label: Crystal medical hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial medical hand. It contains medical tools and improves the tend quality/surgery success chance.

ThingDef.label: Crystal hammer hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial hammer hand. It speeds up construction.

ThingDef.label: Crystal cooking hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial cooking hand. It contains cooking tools, speeds up cooking and decreases the food poison chance.

ThingDef.label: Crystal knife hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial knife hand. It speeds up butchering and improves the melee damage.

ThingDef.label: Crystal club hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial club hand. It improves the melee damage.

ThingDef.label: Crystal axe hand
ThingDef.description: An artificial axe hand. It speeds up plant work speed and improves the melee damage.

ThingDef.label: Adv. Crystal eye
ThingDef.description: An advanced artifical eye.

ThingDef.label: Adv. Crystal arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced artifical arm. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time.

ThingDef.label: Adv. Crystal leg
ThingDef.description: An advanced artifical leg. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time.

ThingDef.label: Adv. Crystal ear
ThingDef.description: An advanced artifical ear.

ThingDef.label: Adv. Crystal joy
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that stimulates the brain's pleasure centers. While it dramatically improves a user's mood, the blanket of happiness makes it hard to concentrate on anything real.

ThingDef.label: Adv. Crystal pain relief
ThingDef.description: A brain implant which inhibits nociception, or pain sensation. While it does allow the user to accomplish more, it turns out pain has a purpose. When you don't feel it, you can get hurt really bad really easily.

ThingDef.label: Adv. Crystal skin
ThingDef.description: This small, flat crystal quickly spreads to cover the user's body. The new skin is very pretty and sturdy, but feels cold.
